episodes.synopsis: Experts re-create severe weather conditions to show the shocking ability of tornadoes and hurricanes to wreak havoc on a home.
episodes.title: Deadly Tornadoes

episodes.synopsis: Experts look at recent earthquakes in Italy, Haiti and Japan to examine the science behind what happened and sift through the wreckage left behind.
episodes.title: Deadly Quakes

episodes.synopsis: Fresh snow is a beautiful sight. But an avalanche of it can engulf entire towns and cities with disquieting, and often deadly, results.
episodes.title: Deadly Avalanches

episodes.synopsis: Eye-opening experiments reveal the surprising power of rising waters, along with their chilling potential to destroy property and end lives.
episodes.title: Deadly Floods

video.title: Forecast: Disaster
video.synopsis: Adventurer Ben Fogle joins leading scientists in exploring the causes and effects of extreme weather forces such as tornadoes, floods and avalanches.
